hirsty.
• Give adequate analgesia - Morphine, IM, 0.1 mg/kg 4 hourly as needed, to a maximum of 10 mg with
Promethazine 25 mg IM.
o In late labour, nitrous oxide 50 per cent and oxygen 50 per cent as required.
• Give Ampicillin 1 g IV six hourly and Gentamicin 240 mg IV as a single dose; or Vancomycin 1 g IV as a single
dos
e (for women allergic to penicillin).
• Monitor intravascular fluids, pulse, respiratory rates and regular auscultation of maternal lung bases is
required during labour.
